BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Landmarks Preservation Commission designation no. DL – 369, LP – 2168, pursuant to §3020 of the New York City Charter, concerning the designation of the Seamen Cottage, located at 441 Clarke Avenue (formerly 218 Center Street), Borough of Staten Island, Council District no. 50, as a landmark.  (Non-ULURP no. 20065150 HKR).
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
